# R client for the Global Lakes and Wetlands Database (GLWD)

## Installation

```{r eval = FALSE}
devtools::install_github("jsta/glwdr")
```

## Usage

### Level 1
```{r eval=FALSE} 
library(glwdr)

glwd_get(level = 1)

dt <- glwd_load(level = 1)

dt@data[1:5,]
```

```{r echo=FALSE} 
library(glwdr)

dt <- invisible(glwd_load(level = 1))

dt@data[1:5,]
```
